articles.title: Jim Hanson: Get out of Afghanistan — a clear, specific declaration would let US leave and put our enemies on notice
articles.description: Safe havens for terror groups are a legitimate concern but don't justify an open-ended commitment.
articles.content:
American troops are still dying in Afghanistan. The real question at this point is, why? We do not have a plan for victory. All we have is a plan to stay so things don’t potentially get worse. That’s not good enough.
